Name: Koh Samui Wedding dj
About: Koh Samui Wedding Dj services has been operational on Koh Samui for over 10 years.   An open format dj / Musician Entertainer dj Blair is an excellent MC to get your party started and continue all night long.   Musical styles for all ages and genera.  Koh Samui Wedding dj Services has been serving Koh Samui's top Resorts and venues  for over 10 years.   The only dj on Samui that offers Live Music Entertainment AND Djing.  Contact Koh Samui Wedding dj Services for your event!!   Sawasdee....

Name: Koh Samui Events
About: Koh Samui events proudly provides DJ's and Sound System services primarily for Weddings and Private Villa Parties, but we love taking on new and interesting jobs and with our wealth of experience on the islands are confident we can cover all your musical needs! The heart of Koh Samui Events ethos is quality and adaptability. With DJ Simon Solo and DJ Jessi's extensive musical backgrounds, their team are the perfect choice for your event.
